jobDescription: Power Quality C++/C# Software Engineer Electrotek Concepts has an immediate need for a software engineer for developing C++/C# power quality applications and back end systems. This position will be located in our Cummings Center office in Beverly, Massachusetts.  Electrotek is a leading power systems engineering consulting firm. We analyze, measure, simulate, and solve electric power systems problems and provide training on power quality and power system topics. Our customers include electric power utilities, commercial & industrial energy users, and research companies. We develop and maintain PQView®, the industry's leading enterprise software for power quality monitoring, analysis, reporting, and automatic fault location. We also commercialize a suite of power quality and energy efficiency analysis tools for electric power transmission and distribution systems. You will be developing software to:Communicate with power quality meters and monitoring systems.Download measurements into databases.Perform numerical algorithms including harmonic analysis, static analysis, and correlations on downloaded measurements.Import data from industry standard PQDIF and COMTRADE format as well as proprietary file and database formats.Export data to industry standard PQDIF and COMTRADE format.
